      • saveChanges

        void saveChanges​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Save the changes made to the name, path, or period. Updates the ScreenShooter.rect var depending on the choice Primary monitor, All monitors, or Selected Area
        Parameters:
        event -

      • pauseCapture

        void pauseCapture​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Can only be activated when a capture session is going on. Pauses the current capture session. Parameters are still locked.
        Parameters:
        event -

      • stopCapture

        public void stopCapture​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Can only be activated when a capture session is going on. Stops the current capture session. Parameters are reset and unlocked.
        Parameters:
        event -

      • newWindow

        Parameters:
        event -

      • selectCaptureZone

        void selectCaptureZone​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Allows you to take captures of only the selected part of your screen. A new window with low opacity will be opened for this.
        Parameters:
        event -
